snippet: Many children  pick up an iPad and figure out how to use it right away. One Laptop Per Child, a nonprofit organization that produces low-cost computers, wants to provide tablets to poor children as well.
abstract: Many children  pick up an iPad and figure out how to use it right away. One Laptop Per Child, a nonprofit organization that produces low-cost computers, wants to provide tablets to poor children as well.

headline.main: Are Tablets Expensive Toys? Not This One
